I backwards branch we should only change tests (as we want to test if a drop-in replacement still works). But never change the src/java folder in BW. So the only option in BW is to comment out that tests, as running them will fail. The functionality is tested by the trunk tests.

Else +1, its rather straightforward; I should have seen this during the Lucene 3.0 police audition :-)
